name: 數學教材教法（教）
comment: 本課程為「雙語教學師資培育課程」數學領域數學專長之必修課程。
description: 本課程主要培養學生進行中學數學教學時理論與實務相連結的知能，除了讓學生具備中學數學教學的技巧、方法、理論，也實施數學例子的教學。
goals: 瞭解中學數學教學的基本理念與教學理論
發展中學數學教學的技巧
熟悉中學數學教學常用的教學法
syllabus:
3 weeks) Principles of CLIL for Mathematics andSTEM

(3 weeks) International standards and materialsup to algebra and basic geometry.

(3 weeks) International standards and materialsup to Pre-calculus

(3 weeks) International standards and materialsCalculus

(2 weeks) Literature case studies andpresentations on CLIL for mathematics

(4 weeks) Deep case study of applying differenttechniques to a topic

本課程包含以下雙語教學師資職前教育課程之課程核心內容：

1\. 何為雙語教學

2\. 雙語教學之語言使用

3\. 雙語課程教學與評量

4\. 認識雙語教學現場概況與運作

5\. 雙語教學實例分析

6\. 雙語教學教案設計

7\. 雙語教學活動設計

8\. 跨領域雙語教學共備

9\. 微型教學與回饋

methodologies.note: Students will explain and discuss their ideas and solutions to prob-lems with other students. In English as well as Chinese
Students will write high school mathematics problems and produce solutions in English
They will demonstrate ability to explain and discuss mathematics education issues in individual face to face assessments with the in-structor.
